Y(13587) = intersection, other than A, B, C, of circumconics {{A, B, C, X(15695), X(16251)}}, {{A, B, C, X(15708), Z(12699)}}

Y(13587) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these {i,j}: {11001, 15706}, {15708, 4}, {15710, 14269}

Y(13587) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): {2, 11111, 632}, {2, 15681, 3522}, {2, 16370, 15723}, {2, 1656, 17528}, {2, 17533, 15694}, {2, 17556, 3526}, {2, 17578, 15687}, {2, 3090, 17564}, {2, 547, 16417}, {4, 30, 15708}, {30, 14269, 15710}, {30, 15706, 11001}, {382, 15687, 15682}, {3146, 17578, 5068}, {3524, 15696, 10304}, {3543, 15640, 3627}, {3543, 15682, 17578}, {3544, 15692, 2}, {3627, 15682, 15721}, {3830, 15684, 15696}, {3830, 15686, 4}, {3839, 10304, 5071}, {3839, 15697, 15699}, {3839, 15710, 17579}, {3839, 15721, 3545}, {3855, 14269, 3839}, {5066, 15691, 12108}, {6993, 15697, 15718}, {11737, 15686, 15700}, {14269, 15688, 11737}, {15682, 15683, 3146}, {15682, 17578, 15683}, {15688, 15694, 17504}

Y(13587) = Orthology center of { (1-t)*A+t*G, ...} and ABC for t=-11/9
